thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Snap Contends With User Outcry: New Isn’t Necessarily Better

author: Georgia Wells
title: Snap Contends With User Outcry: New Isn’t Necessarily Better
text:
Social-media businesses are built on getting people to broadcast their feelings as much as possible. That strategy can cut both ways.

Snap Inc. is battling a backlash from users over a new version of its Snapchat social-media app, which was launched in February and is aimed at broadening its business beyond its core teen and young adult audience. More than 1.2 million Snapchat users have signed a petition to roll back the revamp. In late February, the company’s shares fell about 6% in reaction to this tweet by reality-television... RELATED VIDEO 6 Tips for Surviving the New Snapchat Snap Inc. is rolling out a new version of Snapchat that's surprisingly different than what came before. But don't panic: WSJ's David Pierce explains how to make the most of the new app. Photo/Video: Emily Prapuolenis/The Wall Street Journal
